mix.title: Sorrow-Vomit: 2021-06-06 (New Releases Live Mix: Post-Punk, Darkwave, Cold, Synth, Goth, EBM...)
mix.shortTitle: Sorrow-Vomit: 2021-06-06 (New Releases Live Mix: Post-Punk, Darkwave, Cold, Synth, Goth, EBM...)
mix.description:
Recorded live night of June 6, 2021. Brand new and/or recently released tracks and remixes in the genres of Post-Punk, Darkwave, EBM, Coldwave, Minimal Synth, Gothic, Synthpop and related.
